issues_reports.text: Anybody else’s @UScellular service just quit working?
@DarthOtten13 @UScellular They have horrid roaming I bet that is the problem here in Maine they work leave Maine they are ***
@UScellular None of my numbers affiliated with my account are able to make or receive calls. Online chat is down. What gives?
@uscellular what is going on with your network in WI #uscellularproblems
@UScellular @BGCA_Clubs My service and many otherts is not working right now. I tried private messaging with no response. I cant even call customer service with no phone service.

@MaxROIFarmer @starkj80 @UScellular Sounds about right.  I worked for them 10 years, that’s pretty much the standard answer.  For it to affect service across several states......yeah, not accurate.  Just tell us “we’re aware, unsure, working on it”
@starkj80 @UScellular Sounds like it's a widespread issue
@DarthOtten13 @UScellular Man this is such a common problem us cellular
@UScellular 53186. I already have a ticket open for the other issues I've been having since February
@UScellular Yes I did.  I read that there is a problem where I live.
@UScellular is there an outage in the 53222 area? No calls are going through on mine or my parents’ phones.
@UScellular fix your ****

@MaxROIFarmer @starkj80 @UScellular Iowa too.  Unfortunately my work phone is on their network too, very much looking forward to getting cussed out by countless people when my phone starts dinging all the voicemails
@blake1swanson @starkj80 @UScellular I was told they are having issues with multiple towers over a pretty good area
@UScellular I cannot make a phone call, but can receive calls and have no problem with texts.  I try to call 611 and I get a message of error code 408.
@UScellular @BGCA_Clubs Yo why can't I contact anybody right now? My cell service isn't working

@UScellular @Big_churp @UScellular you clearly have a network issue in WI.  My personal and work phones are on your network and not able to place calls.  Texts work.  My wife on the other side of town is experiencing the same thing
@UScellular Yes I did.  I read that there is a problem where I live.

@UScellular @Big_churp @UScellular you clearly have a network issue in WI.  My personal and work phones are on your network and not able to place calls.  Texts work.  My wife on the other side of town is experiencing the same thing
@UScellular when is phone service going to be restored in Metro Milwaukee?
@FromMke2Nsh @UScellular Sucks doesn't it?
@UScellular @_jamane_ Yo log off and fix your network please
@Chuckanthoine @UScellular It’s confusing that it can be 2021 and I can’t have Dell service EVERYWHERE.

@UScellularCares @GeneCotter @UScellular i cant make calls either, i live in grafton Wisconsin and keeps saying network is down and when someone calls me it says my phone isnt accepting calls. What the HELL is going on. i need my phone working.
@JenLArnold74 @DettmeringDrew @UScellular Tower issues it sounds like, starting to sound like the whole network is jacked up, OK to WI so far in those who've responded to my initial tweet
If you are getting new cell service and it comes down to yelling out of your front door or @UScellular...just yell out the door. Better coverage that way.
@UScellularCares @UScellular Y’all had six months to figure this out. Why should I think you’ll magically fix it now???
@UScellular spotty/no service in the Milwaukee area (53209). Is this being worked on?
@uscellular fix your **** peasants

@USCellular alerted customers that due to their work upgrading to 5G we would experience "an interruption" within 24-48 hours ago. That was last week and our service remains non-functional. Including the hotspot provided by the school, for schoolwork.
